dialogues.text: Did you know? Port Azure was founded by James Hook.
James Hook left the mainland for a life of solitude on Azureal Island, away from the political conflict that took place back then.
Together with some sailors and fishers, he arrived here at the southern beaches, where he established Port Azure. His intention was never to return to the mainland.
Though, Port Azure is still connected to the mainland through a boat service. If you're lucky, Captain Isaac might take you with him next time he leaves!
